text: FundApps - https://fundapps.workable.com/ - London, UK - Onsite - Permanent - Full-time. FundApps was recently recognised as one of the top 50 fintech startups in Europe. We sell a web service that automates financial regulatory compliance. We're a company of 17 right now, and somewhat unusually are a bootstrapped startup are growing rapidly through acquisition of customers rather than funding. Current openings we have in London. - UX Designer & a .NET / Backend Engineer email me direct - james.peters@fundapps.co if you have questions. Thanks!
